channel.title: Is anyone else having trouble with their internet today?
channel.description:
I've used 4 different computers at four different places on four different networks, and all of them are having problems loading websites.
And all of them are using AT&T. So that might be the problem.

item.title: Is anyone else having trouble with their internet today?

item.description:
my internet is working great. damn I love unlimited 3G with wifi tethering

item.title: Is anyone else having trouble with their internet today?

item.title: Is anyone else having trouble with their internet today?
